name: Dr Baggos Super Weapon
description:
Welcome to Dr Baggos Super Weapon! It's like Katamari Damacy... but with guns!

You play as the creature developed in Dr Baggos laboratory. Your special ability? You can control weapons... with your mind! Aiding on your mission to bring the world to it's knees is your power to JOIN TOGETHER and become one with the gun (or as you will soon see... be one with dozens of firearms  at once!)

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move. Left Mouse to Shoot.

Developed for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam "Joined Together".  The game follows the theme by when you find a gun it then becomes linked to you. One gun may not seem like a big deal, but eventually you will have dozens of pistols, machine guns, and rocket launchers all joined together in unison under your control. As your arsenal gets bigger the more enemies you can take on at once... which in turn gives you even more guns to control.

Credits:

Created with Game Maker Studio 2

Programming/Design by Me

Graphics:

Majority of graphics like the tile sets and characters are mostly from Kenney's Top Down Shooter Pack - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/topdown-shooter

Weapons are from Jestan - https://jestan.itch.io/weapons-pack

Tank is from Ragewortt - https://ragewortt.itch.io/top-down-sci-fi-tanks

Sound: 

From https://freesound.org/ - specifically thanks to lemudcrab, marregheriti, superphat, jarusca, highpixel, and tonsil5.
